recipesJson.name: Fruity Bubblegum

recipesJson.description:
ELiquid Recipes Subscriber Profiles: Frooty Bubblegum

Mixing profiles requested by subscribers. 

Watch the video here: https://youtu.be/tgf9hZlPS6w

reviews.text: Itâ€™s tasty after 4 days, not so good as a SnV tho - thanks!

Pretty Solid, I like it! I upped the MB to 4% and it's playing nice with the fruits. I like how the use of banana cream and marshmallow here gives the bubblegum a softer texture. Pretty good off the Shake, definitely a SnV recipe
